title: Home Cook Community Platform
purpose: To connect local home cooks with individuals in their neighborhood who want to buy authentic, home-cooked meals.
goals: Provide an easy-to-use platform for home cooks.
Enable customers to purchase meals easily.
Build a community-based review and rating system.

features.title: Profiles for Cooks
requirements: Cooks can create and manage profiles.
Upload profile pictures and a biography.

features.title: Menu with Photos
requirements: Create and manage menus with descriptions and prices.

features.title: Ordering and Payment System
requirements: Customers can select and order meals.

features.title: Review and Rating System
requirements: Cooks and customers can leave reviews and ratings.
Display average ratings on profiles and menu items.

backend.notes: Ensure secure transaction and data handling.

database.notes: Handle user profiles, menus, orders securely.

nonFunctionalRequirements.security: Implement HTTPS and secure data storage.
nonFunctionalRequirements.scalability: Able to handle increasing number of users and transactions.
nonFunctionalRequirements.performance: Fast load times and quick transactions are crucial.

successMetrics: Number of active cooks and customers monthly.
